Articles.Content:
Hello! Longtime lurker and occasional poster here! I enjoy messing around in KSP more than actually trying to do stuff. I also have a crap computer that I'm going to have to upgrade in the very near future. (a total of 64MB dedicated graphics RAM, so no EVE for me!).

I tend to get very opinionated very fast; beware. Also I'm a law student so I will argue violently/play devil's advocate on occasion. It's fun.

Hey, you're not a newbie. You have 150 posts!

Well, welcome anyway.
